verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- President Donald Trump [V: will] meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore , the US president announced Thursday on Twitter . " The highly anticipated meeting between Kim Jong Un and myself will take place in Singapore on June 12th , " Trump tweeted .
